comment.text: The "SelectButtonText" translation key is used to display a specific button text on the input field in the Portal Settings page. It is used as a placeholder text when a user selects an option from a dropdown list, and its value will be displayed when the selected item is edited or removed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Düymə mətnini seçin" directly translates to "Select Button text". While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Azerbaijani might be "Seçiləcək düymənin mətnini seç" (Select the text of the button to be selected) or "Düymənin mətnini seç" (Select the button's text). The current translation is a bit literal and sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Düymənin mətnini seç

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Изберете Текст на бутон' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning. 'Select Button text' refers to the text displayed on a selection button. A more natural Bulgarian phrasing would convey that meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Бутон за избор на текст

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Text der Auswahlschaltfläche' is literal and slightly awkward in German. A more natural translation would be 'Auswahlschaltflächentext' or 'Text für Auswahlschaltfläche'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Text für Auswahlschaltfläche

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Επιλέξτε κείμενο κουμπιού' literally translates to 'Select button text'. While technically correct, it's not the most natural or idiomatic phrasing in Greek. A more natural translation would be something like 'Κείμενο επιλογής' or 'Κείμενο κουμπιού επιλογής'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Κείμενο επιλογής

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seleccionar texto del botón' is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Select Button text' in a natural Spanish way. It implies selecting the *text* of the button, rather than the action of selecting the button itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation like 'Texto del botón de selección' or 'Etiqueta del botón de selección' depending on the context. If the button's label is meant, 'Texto del botón' is acceptable, but it needs context to ensure it's accurate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sélectionner le texte du bouton' is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in French. 'Select Button text' refers to the text displayed on a selection button. A more natural translation would focus on the button's label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bouton de sélection

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ընտրել Կոճակի տեքստը" is a literal translation of "Select Button text" but doesn't quite convey the intended meaning in Armenian. It translates to "Select the button's text." A more natural and user-friendly translation might be needed depending on the UI context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more contextually appropriate translation like "Ամրացնել Կոճակը" (Confirm Button) or "Ընտրված Կոճակի Տեքստ" (Selected Button Text), or something similar that fits the UI's function. The best option depends on how the "Select Button text" functionality is used.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation 'Selezionare Testo del pulsante' is a literal translation and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Select Button text'. It's awkward and doesn't sound natural in Italian. It should suggest the text that will appear on the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Testo del pulsante' or 'Etichetta del pulsante' depending on the specific context. A more natural phrasing would be 'Testo da visualizzare sul pulsante' if the meaning is the text to be displayed.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ボタンテキストの選択' (Botan Tekisuto no Sentaku) while technically correct, is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally for this context. It implies 'selection of button text' rather than the descriptive label 'Select Button Text'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ボタンテキスト (Botan Tekisuto) or 選択ボタンテキスト (Sentaku Botan Tekisuto) might be more appropriate, depending on the precise intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ເລືອກຂໍ້ຄວາມປຸ່ມ" literally translates to 'Select text button'. While understandable, it's not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Select Button text' in Lao. It implies selecting the text *on* the button, rather than the text displayed on the button itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like "ໂຕ້ຄວາມປຸ່ມເລືອກ" (to-kwam-pum-leuak) which translates to 'Button selection text' or "ຂໍ້ຄວາມໃນປຸ່ມເລືອກ" (kho-kwam-nai-pum-leuak) which means 'Text on select button'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Selecteer Knop tekst' is a literal translation and not the most natural phrasing in Dutch. While understandable, it sounds awkward. A better translation would convey the intended meaning more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Select Knop Tekst

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Selecione o texto do botão' is too literal and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Select Button text' in a UI context. It implies selecting the *text* of the button, rather than the button itself or a selection associated with the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Texto do botão' (Button text) or 'Selecionar botão' (Select button) depending on the specific UI functionality. If the context is to select the text *within* a button, then 'Texto do botão para seleção' could work, though it's verbose.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Selectare text buton' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Select Button text' in Romanian. 'Selectare' implies the act of selecting. A better translation would convey the text *on* the select button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Text buton de selectare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Text buton de selectare' is better, a more idiomatic and concise translation exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Text buton selectare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තෝරන බොත්තමේ පෙළ' while literally meaning 'Selecting button's text', doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Select Button text'. It sounds a bit awkward in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගන්න බොත්තමේ පෙළ (Thoraaganunna bottamē pelā) - 'Select button text' or  තෝදන බොත්තමේ පෙළ (Thodanan bottamē pelā) - 'Selecting button text' (slightly more formal)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation "Vybrať text Tlačidla" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Select Button text' in a natural way. It sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "Text tlačidla na výber" or "Text pre tlačidlo výberu".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Izberi besedilo gumba' while technically correct, is a bit literal. A more natural and user-friendly translation might be 'Besedilo gumba' or 'Tekst gumba'. 'Izberi' (Select) is implied when referring to a UI element's text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Besedilo gumba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Текст дугмета за селектовање" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of "Select Button text". A more natural Serbian translation would convey the purpose or action associated with the button.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Текст за дугме за избор" or "Натпис на дугмету за избор" depending on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tekst dugmeta za selektovanje' is a literal translation but not the most natural way to express "Select Button text" in Serbian. While understandable, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more idiomatic translation such as 'Tekst dugmeta za izbor' or 'Tekst dugmeta za odabir'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Buton metnini seç" literally translates to 'Select button text'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Turkish translation for a UI element label would be 'Düğme Metni' or 'Metin Seç'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Düğme Metni

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Chọn chữ cho Nút' is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Select Button text' naturally in Vietnamese. It translates to 'Choose letters for Button'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like 'Văn bản nút chọn' or 'Chữ trên nút chọn'.
